content.text: Avengers : Endgame is one of 2019 's most anticipated films and now we have a look at what the film will look like for its IMAX release . Also read : ' Avengers : Endgame ' Pop ! Reveals Robert Downey Jr. 's New Iron Man Suit Avengers : Endgame is the end of what began 11 years ago with Marvel 's Iron Man . After 22 interconnected films , we have reached the end of this journey . Earth 's Mightiest Heroes will be uniting once again to avenge those whose lives were snapped away when Thanos completed his infinity Gauntlet in Avengers : Infinity War . With our beloved heroes separated in different locations we will have to wait and see what they 're planning to do to defeat Thanos and repair what he 's done . Now , IMAX has released a video that shows off how its format will feature 26 % more footage . What do you think of the picture difference ?
